trans-unit.source: Radically simplified static file serving for Python web apps
trans-unit.target: 彻底简化了Python Web应用程序的静态文件服务

trans-unit.source: It’s designed to work nicely with a CDN for high-traffic sites so you don’t have to sacrifice performance to benefit from simplicity.
trans-unit.target: 它被设计为与CDN一起很好地用于高流量站点，因此您不必为了获得简单性而牺牲性能。

trans-unit.source: Radically simplified static file serving for WSGI applications
trans-unit.target: 大大简化了WSGI应用的静态文件服务。

trans-unit.source: Serving compressed content (gzip and Brotli formats, handling Accept-Encoding and Vary headers correctly)
trans-unit.target: 服务于压缩内容(gzip和Brotli格式,正确处理Accept-Encoding和Vary头)。

trans-unit.source: Setting far-future cache headers on content which won’t change
trans-unit.target: 在不会改变的内容上设置未来的缓存头
要开始使用，请参阅文档。

trans-unit.source: WhiteNoise takes care of best-practices for you, for instance:
trans-unit.target: 例如,WhiteNoise为您提供最佳实践。

trans-unit.source: WhiteNoise works with any WSGI-compatible app but has some special auto-configuration features for Django.
trans-unit.target: WhiteNoise适用于任何WSGI兼容的应用,但对Django有一些特殊的自动配置功能。

trans-unit.source: With a couple of lines of config WhiteNoise allows your web app to serve its own static files, making it a self-contained unit that can be deployed anywhere without relying on nginx, Amazon S3 or any other external service. (Especially useful on Heroku, OpenShift and other PaaS providers.)
trans-unit.target: 通过几行配置WhiteNoise可以让你的web应用服务于自己的静态文件,使其成为一个独立的单元,可以部署在任何地方,而不依赖于nginx、Amazon S3或任何其他外部服务。在Heroku、OpenShift和其他PaaS提供商上特别有用)。

trans-unit.source: Worried that serving static files with Python is horribly inefficient? Still think you should be using Amazon S3? Have a look at the Infrequently Asked Questions.
trans-unit.target: 担心使用Python提供静态文件的效率非常低吗？还是认为您应该使用Amazon S3？看看不常见的问题。
